Package com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.utils.math

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.utils.math.MathUtils
  • public class MathUtils
extends Object
    A powerful utility class to assist in the parsing and evaluation of arithmetic functions with custom variables and operations through a recursive algorithm.
    Author:
    Parker Hawke - 2008Choco

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      static boolean injectMathematicalOperator​(String functionName, DoubleUnaryOperator operator)
      Inject a custom mathematical operation into the expression parser.

      Evaluate a basic mathematical expression.

    • Method Detail

      • parseExpression

        public static MathExpression parseExpression​(String expression,
                                             Map<String,Double> variables)
        Evaluate a mathematical expression with given variables.
        Parameters:
        expression - the string to parse
        variables - the map containing necessary variables for this expression (To modify variables at any given time between evaluations, replace values in the map)
        Returns:
        The mathematical expression

      • parseExpression

        public static MathExpression parseExpression​(String expression)
        Evaluate a basic mathematical expression. Variables are not permitted in expressions parsed by this method. For variable-based functions, see parseExpression(String, Map).
        Parameters:
        expression - the string to parse
        Returns:
        The mathematical expression

      • injectMathematicalOperator

        public static boolean injectMathematicalOperator​(String functionName,
                                                 DoubleUnaryOperator operator)
        Inject a custom mathematical operation into the expression parser.
        Parameters:
        functionName - the name of the function to inject (i.e. "sqrt")
        operator - the operation to perform when parsing this function
        Returns:
        true if successful. false if operator already exists
